titles.title: Emergency Relief for Student Borrowers Act of 2020
Emergency Relief for Student Borrowers Act of 2020
Emergency Relief for Student Borrowers Act of 2020
To provide relief for Federal and private student loan borrowers during the COVID-19 pandemic, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
